Internationalization
• Internationalization is the process of generalizing a product 
so that it can handle multiple languages and cultural 
conventions without the need for re-design. 
Internationalization takes place at the level of program design 
and document development (LISA).
• Important aspects:
– Separating text from the source code – > prevents 
translators from changing the source code
– Internationalization is also applied to online help, 
documentation and web sites
– Technical writers have to take internationalization into 
account: “writing for a global audience”, “web site 
globalization”
